extension.name: Tools - Java
extension.author: HUBzero
extension.description: Display a tool session with Java

field.name: browsers
field.default: *, safari 1.0 *, chrome 999999.0 *, iceweasel 1.0 *, firefox 1.0 *, opera 1.0 *, IE 3.0 *, mozilla 5.0 iOS, Safari 9999.9
field.label: Minimum OS/Browsers
field.description: A list of minimum OS/Browser required. One entry per line, the pattern is 'OS, BROWSER MAJOR.MINOR'. If all OSes apply, us an asterisk.

field.name: regexes
field.label: UAS Regexes
field.description: A list of regular expressions to run against the User Agent String. One entry per line. If a UAS matches a pattern, the plugin will no render.
